summary: Relating to the Department of Administrative Services; authorizing a call for bids for the development of a health care facility in southeast Seattle; authorizing negotiation of a lease and lease back agreement for such facility; authorizing the purchase of land in connection therewith; authorizing a sale of land and the dedication of proceeds in connection therewith; authorizing a sublease agreement with a private nonprofit community health clinic; increasing an expenditure allowance in the 1986 Budget of the Department; and making an appropriation from the Cumulative Reserve Fund therefor.
